episodes.title: Ashen Blade Chronicles
episodes.description: A realm-walking swordsman hunts a forbidden name across fractured realms. Hit checkpoints to earn new cards.

cinder_arrival.title: Arrival on Cinders
cinder_arrival.content: The air tastes like burnt paper. Between two ruined skies, your blade points toward a name you swore to erase.

market_of_masks.title: Market of Masks
market_of_masks.content: Vendors trade memories for coin. A masked broker offers you a shortcut to the forbidden name ‚Äî for a price you can‚Äôt unsay.

duel_at_ash.title: Duel at the Ashline
duel_at_ash.content: The warrior‚Äôs stance is perfect ‚Äî too perfect. Their blade is familiar, like an echo. They ask one question: 'Do you want truth, or victory?'

fracture_gate.title: The Fracture Gate
fracture_gate.content: A gate of cracked glass shows the name you hunt written across countless timelines. One timeline saves a city. Another burns it.

ending_hollow.title: Ending: Hollow Victory
ending_hollow.content: You win the duel ‚Äî and lose the reason you started. The realms stop whispering. The blade stays sharp. Your story becomes quiet.

ending_erase.title: Ending: The Erasure
ending_erase.content: You strike the name from the gate. The fracture seals. Somewhere a city survives ‚Äî somewhere else, you never existed to save it.

ending_guard.title: Ending: The Guardian Blade
ending_guard.content: You sheath the blade and take the name with you. The gate remains, but it no longer owns you. The realms will test you again.
